events.message: I recently received my order but the product has a large scratch on the screen and it looks damaged.
The reported issue has been identified as a product defect due to damage and scratches on arrival.
Your case has been assigned to an agent who will assist you with the defective product.
Hello! I'm here to assist you with the issue regarding the scratch and damage on your product.
Could you please provide photos of the scratched area and the packaging it came in?
I have attached clear photos showing the scratch on the product screen as well as the box it was shipped in.
Thank you for the photos. We can offer you a replacement unit or a full refund. Please let us know which you prefer.
I would prefer a replacement, as I really like the product but want one without damage.
A replacement order has been processed and will be shipped within three business days to your address.
Just checking in to make sure you received the replacement product and that it arrives in perfect condition.
